content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ do you know somebunny special who would love a new friend to cuddle with our be my bunny crochet design is guaranteed to bring a smile to your face and warm fuzzies to your heart this little guy is irresistibly fluffy and soft perfect for snuggling with this pattern you ll be able to create your very own bunny that looks like it stepped right out of a children s story book once you ve finished crocheting you won t be able to resist giving it a squeeze and feeling how truly cuddly it is supplies yarn quantities wecrochet wonderfluff 1 70% baby alpaca 7% merino wool 23% nylon 142 yds/50g colorways finnley heather or hare heather 2 balls for each bunny while you can do this with two balls it s playing a bit of yarn chicken so add a 3rd ball if you don t want to stress wecrochet dishie 2 100% cotton 190yds/100g colorway blush for heart sunbaked and honeydew for carrot approx 30 yds main color for each accessory yarn substitutions brava worsted 3 100% premium acrylic 218yds/100g any worsted weight yarn will work as a substitution changing the brand might change the size but since gauge isn t critical that s okay crochet hook 4 size g 4 0mm crochet hook notions scissors 5 yarn needle 6 removable stitch marker 7 10mm safety eyes safety eye tool 8 fiberfill/stuffing round magnets optional 9 rectangle magnets optional 10 eyeshadow for cheeks 11 small brush or velcro to fluff yarn 12 skill level advanced beginner working in the round with some increasing and decreasing sizing approx 13 inches tall and 5 inches wide at it s belly the accessories are 2 25 to 3 25 inches tall abbreviations blo - back loop only chain - chain mc - magic_ring round- round single_crochet - single_crochet decrease - single_crochet 2 together see below for invisible decrease tip slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es gauge 17 sts x 16 row = 4x4 inches in single_crochet not critical for this pattern construction the body of the crochet doll is worked from top-down with the arms legs ears and tail crocheted after and stitched to the body the accessories are made separately and can be attached to the bunny s hands with the optional magnets or sewn together using a small brush to fluff your yarn will give your bunny a soft fuzzy look notes for the be my bunny crochet pattern since this is worked continuously a chain 1 at the beginning of the round is not needed it is helpful to place a stitch marker on the first stitch of each round you can change the size of your bunny by changing your yarn and hook size be sure to make a gauge swatch to ensure that your fabric is the correct density so your
